column1: Kata Robata////My friend and I came for dinner on a weekday after going to the disappointing Poke Pop Up event. Since we were craving some kind of fish
column2: we decided to get some sushi. It was my first time coming to Kata
column4: I didn't set my spirits high. The sign looks like your run of the mill 4 dollar sushi roll restaurant
column5: but I guess you should never judge a book by its cover. The interior of the restaurant is absolutely gorgeous
column6: but could do with a bit more lighting.
